welcome:
Welcome to rock, paper, scissors, lizard, spock! 
 For a full list of rules please visit:
 https://web.archive.org/web/20181217114425/http://www.samkass.com/theories/RPSSL.html
promptValidInputs:
Choose one: rock, paper, scissors, lizard, or spock. 
You may also type r, p, sc, l, or sp instead.
invalidInput: That's not a valid choice. Please try agin.
userGrandWin: You won 5 times, making you the grand winner! Congratulations!
compGrandWin: The computer won 5 times, making it grand winner! Better luck next time.
promptPlayAgain: Do you want to play again (y/n)?
invalidPlayAgain:
It doesn't look like you entered a valid key. 
 Please enter 'y' or 'n'.
